data.name: strNoCardError
data.value: Please select a player card and seep cards(if required) for this function

data.name: strInvalidError
data.value: Invalid Move becasue player 1 has not started the game yet

data.name: strPickCardError1
data.value: You can not pick cards in middle becasue Player 1 has choosen:

data.name: strPickCardError2
data.value: You can not pick cards in middle becasue cards in middle do not adds up to multiples of your card

data.name: strThrowCardError1
data.value: You can not Throw this card in the middle becasue player 1 has choosen:

data.name: strPileCardError1
data.value: You can not make this pile becasue you have choosen:

data.name: strPileCardError2
data.value: You can not make this pile becasue you do not have a card to pick this pile

data.name: strPileCardError3
data.value: You can not make this pile becasue pile Value is less than 9

data.name: strPileCardError4
data.value: You can not make this pile becasue total value of cards excluding biggest card (over 9) is not multiple of biggest card(over 9)

data.name: strPickPileError1
data.value: You did not select a pile to pick in the middle

data.name: strPickPileError2
data.value: You can not pick this pile becasue pile Value and/or cards in the middle does not make up multiples of your card

data.name: strAddPileError1
data.value: You can not Add Pile becasue you have not picked a pile to add to

data.name: strAddPileError2
data.value: You can not Add Pile becasue player card and cards in the middle do not add up to multiples of pile you are adding to

data.name: strAddPileError3
data.value: You can not Add Pile becasue total value of cards below 9 is not multiple of card greater than value 9 in this play

data.name: strChangePileError1
data.value: You need to select one player card and a pile card

data.name: strChangePileError2
data.value: You can not Add a Player card over 4 in face value

data.name: strChangePileError3
data.value: You selected a pile card that is not a pile

data.name: strChangePileError4
data.value: You selected a pile that is FINAL and can not be changed

data.name: strChangePileError5
data.value: Player card face value added to pile value can not be more than 13 in value

data.name: strSeepPointError1
data.value: You need to select only a player card

data.name: strSeepPointError2
data.value: Multiple Piles in the middle and it is not a seep situation

data.name: strSeepPointError3
data.value: Pile in the middle is final and other cards in the middle, so it is not a seep situation

data.name: strSeepPointError4
data.value: Pile and card in the middle are not multiple of player card, so it is not a seep situation
